about_the_game:
Turte is a simple yet engaging game where players click on a turtle to increase their score. With straightforward mechanics and an easy-to-understand interface, Turte offers an enjoyable experience for players of all ages.

As you progress in the game, you will earn points that can be used to purchase a cosmetic variant of the Turtles adding an extra layer of excitement to the gameplay. The game is designed to be casual and fun, making it perfect for short bursts of play or extended sessions.

Key Features
Simple and Addictive Gameplay: Click on the turtle to increase your score and watch your progress grow.
Variety of Turtles: Unlock different types of turtles, including rare and animated ones, each with unique designs.
Regular Drops: Receive new turtles at regular intervals, ensuring a steady stream of rewards and excitement.
Beautiful Graphics: Enjoy the serene, mystical pond setting with detailed and charming visuals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
